short_description: craft sake shoten is a pub/bar based in yokohama, japan.
long_description: at our shop we are constantly looking to expand the taste horizons of our customers and provide quality sake education to our global community. join us for a tailored tasting experience where we guide you through our curated sake selection to help you find your preferred sake palate. in 2016 we decided to leve california to come to japan in pursuit of our dream, the exploration of a wonderful country filled with delicious foods. this led to us openeing our tasting room as a means to further explore the industry and provide education to the global community. our passion is sake and education around it. available only for a limited time. #sake #日本酒 #yokohama #craftsake #kazenomori. all their sake is made from their estate farmed yamada nishiki in mie. casual sake bars featuring revolving sake menu carefully selected by experienced sommeliers from america. craft sake shoten offers casual bar and restaurant experiences with an ever changing sake lineup. started in 2017 in yokohama, our concepts have become community social spots revolving around great sake, good people.
business_tags: tasting rooms | the tasting room | brewery | tasting experiences | delicious foods | japanese sake | tasting menu | systems engineering | course package | education & courses
generated_description: craft sake shoten is a casual sake bar and restaurant chain based in yokohama, kanagawa prefecture. established in 2017 by american wine lover brian hutto, the company offers a rotating selection of sake from across japan, featuring a range of flavors from light to full-bodied, sweet to dry. each location provides a unique dining experience, combining traditional japanese izakaya culture with western fusion dishes. craft sake shoten aims to create a social and welcoming environment for its patrons, ensuring a diverse and exceptional sake experience.
